name: COD Zombies-Prototype-Beta
description:
This version is based on the zombie's mode of Call of Duty Cold War, with almost all its mechanics and gameplay but in development, there are several things prepared such as more perks, power-ups, rare rest, advanced movement, multiplayer, version for mobile devices, etc. 

This includes:

-Basic zombie

- Hellhound

-Rounds

-Special round

-Perk_Juggernog

-Power Up_X2

-Power up to level 3

-Weapon rarities up to level 5

-Mystery Box

-Doors

-Wall weapons

-Advanced menu

-Gunsmith

-Equipment & Semtex
